name: Sol (scorpioservo)
description:
Sol is a simple puzzle game based on the theme "Joined Together". 

Each level you start with a single candle and must light all of the candles to win. But each candle you light also comes under your control. Can you solve these hastily thrown together levels?

A GMTK Game Jam 2021 Submission!

Music by:

chasem2014 (https://soundcloud.com/user-299109264)

Pinanonam (https://soundcloud.com/user-441012087)
